TEXT.S: = Tasutasunan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Hwareynsu ka alang Tasutasunan. 3,465 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 7,402 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 53% niqan 3,908 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 47% niqan 3,494 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 37%, Bunun 2%, Tayal 2%, Paiwan 1%, Truku 6%, Sakizaya 3%, ni rahuq na o 1%.
